title: Blended Learning-Based Simulation Training for Digital Citizenship Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic digital tools and foundational mathematical knowledge
context.additional_context: Application of blended learning combining VR simulations with mobile learning platforms in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain five core principles for ethical decision-making in digital environments (privacy protection, cyberbullying prevention, information verification, digital inclusivity, responsible content sharing) using real-world case-based examples
Learners can analyze digital citizenship conflict situations arising in the data-driven problem-solving process through VR simulations and propose solutions.
Learners can collaborate with peers using mobile collaboration tools to develop a digital citizenship action plan and create an executable action plan.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
